issue.title: PX4/rotors SITL support requires sensor level data

content.raw:
Hello ! Nice idea! 

I work on the ardupilot side from time to time.
The main issue I see is the frame conversion that are missing in gazebo. If we take gazebo GPS output for example, it is in NWU frame with no way to change it, and ardupilot (and I assume PX4 ) want NED frame input. (90° offset hack isn't nice for newcomer )
content.html:
Hello ! Nice idea!

I work on the ardupilot side from time to time. The main issue I see is the frame conversion that are missing in gazebo. If we take gazebo GPS output for example, it is in NWU frame with no way to change it, and ardupilot (and I assume PX4 ) want NED frame input. (90° offset hack isn't nice for newcomer )
